tool_description: Calculates house cusps and determines house placements for planets using various house division systems.

latitude.description: Birth location latitude in decimal degrees

longitude.description: Birth location longitude in decimal degrees

house_system.description: House division system: Placidus, Koch, Equal, Whole_Sign, Campanus, Regiomontanus

planet_longitudes.description: Array of planet longitude positions in degrees

error_messages: Invalid house system: Use one of [Placidus, Koch, Equal, Whole_Sign, Campanus, Regiomontanus].
Insufficient planet data: Provide at least 10 planet longitude positions.
Calculation impossible: House system cannot be calculated for extreme polar latitudes in some systems.
Invalid coordinates: Latitude and longitude must be within valid ranges.
usage: Provide birth data, choose a house system, and input planet longitudes from Planetary Position Calculator. Returns house cusps and planet house placements.

house_cusps.description: Twelve house cusp positions in degrees (0-360)
